members.title: Jacques Martiquet
members.subtitle: Founder and Director at VYVIFY - Sparking Vitality into Humanity
members.text: VYVIFY is a social movement, a tribe of conscious partygoers, and an entertainment agency. Our mission is to spark vitality in humanity by creating electrifying social experiences centered on dance and cultivating connection and elation. We want to design a new party culture.

members.title: Alex Nunn
members.subtitle: Head of Movement Building at Action for Happiness
members.text: Facilitator and organiser inspiring folk to take action for a happier and kinder world. Believes in solution focused change and non-violent direct action. Student of the Buddha
